title: Enhancing CS (Customer Service) Competency in Practice: Designing Language Assessment Projects Applying Assessment-for-Learning Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design language assessment projects applying instructional assessment methodologies based on the ADDIE model
Learners can analyze the validity and reliability of language proficiency assessment tools through project-based assessments
Learners can propose three or more assessment strategies reflecting adult learner characteristics (andragogy)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
